https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/WnK7bkuL7IDAMqlL6HbWOYyAnM.jpg Max Walker is a suicidal man who selects an aspiring young filmmaker to record the end of his life. On the agenda for his last day on Earth: telling off his old boss, confessing some of his deepest secrets, and maybe even finding redemption. A Broken Life
